name: Flatwood
description:
Will you be able to find the right combination of actions to escape the Flatwood Forest?

In this game you need to find the right combination of actions to complete your run through the forest and escape the Flatwood Monster, but to achieve the right combination you'll need to die again and again.

This game was made in the course of Game Jam of Bezalel Academy and The Hebrew University.
Art by: Ariel Zanzuri, Noa Lev
Code by: Matan Goldshtein, Andy Benichou

Controls:

Mouse - choose actions

Space Bar - use action

R key - kill yourself
